ygData.subject: Re: Verant ruined the revive line of spellsy
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a verified Druid only weapon, it was found on my server, it is called Heirophants crook, the only problem is you have to kill lord Nagafen to get it
ygData.messageBody:
There is a verified Druid only weapon, it was found on my server, it is
called Heirophants crook, the only problem is you have to kill lord Nagafen
to get it

Bree Wyndsdale
40th cleric of Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 30, 1999 11:55 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Verant ruined the revive line of spellsy


>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
>On Fri, 30 Jul 1999, I. G wrote:
>
>> Hmmmm yes you do... Oaken Scimatar.. well known just hard to get.
>> not only that but it is a plus 9!!! to wisdom!
>
>Err. The only place a verified Oaken Scimitar has been found is on the
>test server. the GM activate the Quest for a specific person, then
>deactivated it, in that case.
>
>Other than that, this is still a myth on any real server.
>
>
